Description: Only the most battle hardened warriors filled with a lust for revenge will return as a Grave Knight.  This undead warrior may be sentient, but it has no understanding of a living world now alien to him.  It can only see its own bloodlust and thirst for vengeance. Only the most powerful Masterminds can control them.

Powers.DescLong: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.
Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.
Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.
Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Siphon Life attack.
You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
